errors.no-fallback-category: Cannot delete category while no fallback category exists

client-modal.title: Client
client-modal.description: Clients must only have a unique company number when set, and a name, all other information is without restrictions or validation. We do recommend filling out as much correct information as possible, as this makes it easier to process deliveries
client-modal.name: Name
client-modal.name-tooltip: Name to help identify the client
client-modal.companyNumber-tooltip: Unique identifier for the company. Must be unique across all clients.
client-modal.contactEmail-tooltip: Email address of the main point of contact for this client
client-modal.contactName-tooltip: Full name of the main point of contact
client-modal.contactNumber-tooltip: Phone number of the main point of contact
client-modal.invoiceEmail-tooltip: Email to receive invoices and billing-related communications

manage-delivery.failed: Failed to submit your delivery, check your input

dashboard.title: Management dashboard
dashboard.sub-title: Contact your idp manager if you're missing perms

products.title: Product Management

no-categories.title: No Categories Available
no-categories.message: You need to create at least one category before you can add products. Categories help organize your products and make them easier to manage.

no-products.title: No Products Found
no-products.message: Your product catalog is empty. Start building your inventory by creating your first product.

products.confirm-delete-product: Are you certain you want to delete {{name}}?
products.destructive-actions: This action is destructive, and cannot be undone!
products.confirm-delete-category: Are you certain you want to delete {{name}}?
products.confirm-delete-category-re-assign: {{products}} Product will be re-assigned to the category "{{newCategory}}"

header.name: Name
header.size: Amount of products in this category

no-clients.title: No clients found
no-clients.message: Import or create clients ahead of time to save you time while creating deliveries in the future!

product-modal.title: Product
product-modal.description: Products are anything that may appear in a delivery, group them together by using categories
product-modal.name: Name
product-modal.description-tooltip: Optional extra information about the product to help users identify it
product-modal.category-tooltip: Defines how the product is grouped in the new delivery form
product-modal.type-tooltip: How often can the product be bought per delivery
product-modal.is-tracked-tooltip: When disabled, product is no longer tracked in stock. You have to remove the current amount manually if applicable

product-category-modal.title: Product Category
product-category-modal.description: Categories group together different items, and give some order to your delivery form. It is recommended to make not too big, nor too small.
product-category-modal.first-run: You must have at least one category before you can start creating product
product-category-modal.name: Name
product-category-modal.name-tooltip: Name displayed in the new delivery form, must be unique
product-category-modal.enabled-tooltip: When a category is disabled, all products in it will become disabled too
product-category-modal.auto-collapse-tooltip: When enabled, will hide products in this category by default in the new delivery form

callback.title: Authenticating...
callback.message: Please wait while we complete your sign-in.
callback.info: This should only take a moment
